title: STEM & Robotics Trainer
description: Provided training to school students in Robotics and STEM learning. Focused on foundational concepts of engineering and innovation through hands-on activities and Lego Mindstorms kits.

title: Admissions Intern
description: Handled telemarketing and follow-ups for potential students, closed hot leads, and assisted in processing documents for confirmed admissions.

title: General Secretary
description: Led the student council operations, organized campus events, maintained meeting documentation, and ensured student discipline across intra and inter-university functions.

title: Jaguar Land Rover 4x4 Project Intern
description: Developed baseline code and design for the Jaguar Land Rover 4x4 in Schools Technology Challenge. Supported student engineering projects that simulate real-world vehicle navigation and automation.

title: Autodesk Student Ambassador
description: Acted as a bridge between Autodesk and the student community. Led workshops, demos, and campus events promoting Autodesk's design software. Enabled peer learning and helped students showcase skills for better career prospects.

title: Digitization & VR Development Intern
description: Led the pilot for a VR-based team-building game aimed at corporate learning. Contributed to the early adoption of immersive experiences within learning ecosystems.

title: Digital Learning Executive
description: Driving digital transformation in learning across the MENA region. Implemented Axonify microlearning platform for 20+ clients, built AI avatars and chatbots for sales and training, delivered facilitator tech training, and led customer success initiatives. Ongoing focus on innovation, client empowerment, and the use of immersive technologies.
